general_info.summary: This document outlines various programs and resources at Sharda University, spanning academic offerings like the School of Dental Sciences, Medical Sciences, and Nursing Science, along with administrative and student-focused initiatives. It includes details on examinations, academic credit systems, curriculum feedback, university publications, university structure (leadership, history, statutory bodies), tenders, legal frameworks, COVID-19 information, counseling services, skill enhancement programs, and career development resources. Additionally, it highlights specific ventures like FM radio, visa and insurance guidelines, mentoring portals, and opportunities for international collaboration and career paths.
